amendment.description: An amendment numbered 30 printed in House Report 116-42 to include findings that essential in achieving the nationally determined contribution target is a thriving clean energy industry in the United States, which currently employs over 500,000 Americans.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Krishnamoorthi amendment (A029) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment (A029) offered by Mr. Krishnamoorthi.
Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Krishnamoorthi amendment (A029) Agreed to by voice vote.
